meanings.definition: A person or thing that startles.
meanings.sent1: The sudden noise from the fireworks was a startlers for the cat.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected thunderstorm was full of startlers for the children.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy turned into a little startlers, scaring the birds away.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie was a collection of startlers, each scene more shocking than the last.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was filled with eerie startlers around every corner.

meanings.sent1: The startlers in the garden were actually just playful squirrels.
meanings.sent2: The startlers at the party were all dressed in colorful costumes.
meanings.sent3: The startlers on the shelf seemed to be watching over the room with their glass eyes.
meanings.sent4: The startlers in the museum came to life in the dim light, creating a surreal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The startlers in the forest turned out to be a family of deer, peacefully grazing.
